scenario: In 2024, Bob has an Adjusted Gross Income (AGI) of $161,980.16. Bob makes a charitable contribution of $114,629.56 in cash to a public charity. Under I.R.C. § 170(b)(1)(B)(ii), the deduction is limited to 50% of the contribution base.
question: Calculate the allowable charitable deduction for 2024.
answer_explanation: The deduction is limited to 50% of AGI ($80,990.08). Allowable: $80,990.08.
reasoning: Calculated limit and compared to contribution.
